text: [Music]
hi
welcome back to the break room i'm jason
kessler i am here
to talk about the office with you
because what's more fun than that so
we've been asking for your comments and
your questions so the question this week
is what was your favorite creed thoughts
post
and that might mean nothing to anybody
because you might not know
that one of my big claims to fame and i
say that completely facetiously
is that i wrote the creed thoughts blog
for nbc.com
uh back in like 2007. i was officially
the digital writer
in season four and this creed thoughts
blog was kind of the beginning of that
so as the digital writer i did
all the online content for the show but
not the webisodes which is a whole other
uh story to tell but we started off with
just written content on nbc.com
and one of the very first things was
creed thoughts creed thoughts if you are
a big time office fan is a fictional
blog
that appears at the end of season three
it's in the job episode
uh ryan has a talking head where he says
that he
created this blog for creed but it's
actually just a word document
so that the world would not be exposed
to creed's crazy brain
creed however thinks it's a real blog
and he tells you the address of it which
is
www.creedthots.gov
www.backslashcreedthoughts
check it out which obviously won't take
you anywhere
but what's super cool is that in may of
2007 when this episode aired
you could google creed thoughts and it
would send you to nbc.com
because we decided to make an actual
creed thoughts blog and then
i was tasked with with writing it and
it was so much fun because who is more
fun to write for than creed
who is just crazy so we decided to make
a blog based on his brain and if you
love the show and love creed you know
that he says some crazy things he grows
mung beans in his drawer
and he shows you a foot with four toes
and
oh man i love me some creed and so
i to to answer the question now that
i've been speaking for what feels like
27 minutes is what was your favorite
creed thoughts post
and i think it's one of the very first
ones it started out
being almost like a list of of just
one-liners
and the very first one you can actually
see in the episode if you look closely
and it's like heyo cyberworld this is
creed and that one was written by mike
shure
i took over after that and so my job as
this like
very young writer was like how do you
write as this
crazy dude who doesn't have that much of
a backstory
and i just leaned into the idea that
he's just thinking these
isolated thoughts he's just kind of
thinking these crazy little things that
float into his brain and then they pop
out of his brain
so let's read my favorite creed thoughts
uh which
came on may may 31st 2007 which is like
two weeks after the episode aired
the first one is where's thousand island
i've got some vacation time saved up and
it sounds like a delicious place to
visit heat next says rip your floats
it does i've tested it thank you creed
there's a fat man that sits by me he has
some sort of multicolored power beans
i need those beans man and i can
definitely see creed saying that
the last thing i want to deal with at
work is people it's a true thing for
everybody i think
this next one is my favorite i've been
thinking about buying a horse great for
transportation and once you're done with
it
you've got about seven days worth of
meals um
i think that's creed that sums up creed
he's
he's crafty he's always thinking about a
plan and he would absolutely eat a horse
when he's done with it never trust
mailmen
and then it finishes with a reminder of
michael's safe combo that he gets wrong
every single time um and that's my
favorite creed thoughts
and that's it that's the end of this
